meanings.definition: A rod or staff carried as a symbol of authority or office.
meanings.sent1: The king held his golden baculums high during the ceremony.

meanings.definition: A bone found in the penis of many mammals.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the baculums of different animal species.
meanings.sent2: The baculums of the gorilla is larger compared to other primates.
meanings.sent3: The museum displayed a rare fossilized baculums from an ancient mammal.
meanings.sent4: The baculums is a unique bone that serves a specific purpose in reproduction.
